message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.NE 

The paper deals with statistical learning theory and generalization error, which are core topics in machine learning. The use of mutual information and sub-Gaussian loss functions also suggests a focus on theoretical aspects of machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also deals with iterative algorithms and Markovian structure, which are topics in information theory (cs.IT) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The mention of stochastic gradient Langevin dynamics (SGLD) and stochastic gradient Hamiltonian Monte Carlo (SGHMC) algorithms suggests a focus on control systems (cs.SY) and neural networks (cs.NE).
